mleko.cache.handlers.joblib_cache_handler#

This module contains the CacheHandler for serializing and deserializing data using joblib.

Module Contents#

Functions#

write_joblib(→ None)

Writes the given data to a cache file at the specified path, serializing it using joblib.

read_joblib(→ Any)

Reads the cache file from the specified path and returns the deserialized data.

Attributes#

JOBLIB_CACHE_HANDLER

A CacheHandler for Python objects using joblib.
mleko.cache.handlers.joblib_cache_handler.write_joblib(cache_file_path: pathlib.Path, output: Any) → None#

Writes the given data to a cache file at the specified path, serializing it using joblib.

Parameters:

  • cache_file_path (pathlib.Path) – A Path object representing the location where the cache file should be saved.

  • output (Any) – The data to be serialized and saved to the cache file.

Return type:

None

mleko.cache.handlers.joblib_cache_handler.read_joblib(cache_file_path: pathlib.Path) → Any#

Reads the cache file from the specified path and returns the deserialized data.

Parameters:

cache_file_path (pathlib.Path) – A Path object representing the location of the cache file.

Returns:

The deserialized data stored in the cache file.

Return type:

Any

mleko.cache.handlers.joblib_cache_handler.JOBLIB_CACHE_HANDLER#

A CacheHandler for Python objects using joblib.
